name: Binky's X-Mas Hunt
description:
Can you help Binky and his brother to save their village from starvation this Christmas? 

- Hunt mice, squirrels and birds in 8 challenging levels of platforming fun

- Colourful sprites and hand-painted backgrounds 

- Challenging gameplay 

- Secret areas to find 

This is a little freeware game I completed in a month to celebrate Christmas this year.
